2. Glomerulosclerosis - This is a medical condition characterized by the scarring of the glomeruli, which are the tiny blood vessels in the kidneys that filter waste and excess fluids from the blood. Glomerulosclerosis can lead to kidney damage and even kidney failure in severe cases.
